Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.en: “The Name of Adonoy will be blessed from now forever.”
Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.heRef: סידור אשכנז, ברכות, ברכת המזון י״א

Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.en: Blessed is (our God) He for we have eaten of His bounty and through His goodness we live.
Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.heRef: סידור אשכנז, ברכות, ברכת המזון ט״ו

Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.en: The Name of Adonoy will be blessed from now forever.
Siddur Ashkenaz, Berachot, Birkat HaMazo.heRef: סידור אשכנז, ברכות, ברכת המזון ט׳
